The Runge-Kutta method involves the following calculations for each step:

k1 = h * f(x0, y0)
k2 = h * f(x0 + h/2, y0 + k1/2)
k3 = h * f(x0 + h/2, y0 + k2/2)
k4 = h * f(x0 + h, y0 + k3)

y1 = y0 + (k1 + 2*k2 + 2*k3 + k4)/6
x1 = x0 + h
